question.prompt: Which of these devices is not a computer?
question.feedback: A desktop is a computer.
A laptop is a computer.
A tablet is a computer.
A monitor is not a computer.

question.prompt: Which of the following parts of a computer is considered as input device?
question.feedback: Speakers are output devices.
A screen is an output device.
A keyboard is an input device.
A motherboard is a part of the base unit.

question.prompt: Harold needs to purchase a computer as they’re starting university. What they want is a computer with a built-in keyboard to type their lecture notes, and to work on their assignments at home. They’ll also need various applications and programs installed on the computer to complete their assignments. What is the best type of computer for their needs?
question.feedback: A desktop is not a portable device.
A laptop is a portable device with built-in keyboard.
A tablet is portable, but does not usually have built-in keyboards.
A smartphone is portable, but does not usually have a built-in keyboard.

question.prompt: Which of these functions is a task of an operating system:
question.choice: Showing the user the working area
Allowing the user to interact with the screen
question.feedback: This task is one of the functions of the operating system.
This task is the function of the screen.
This task is the function of the keyboard.
This task is the function of the mouse.

question.prompt: An operating system is the most important ___________ on the computer.
question.feedback: An operating system is software.
An operating system is the software that manages all the other hardware and software.
An operating system is not a peripheral device.
An operating system is not an application.

question.prompt: What happens when you select the "Minimize" button at the top of an application window?
question.choice: The window moves to the side of the screen
question.feedback: The window closes when you click the X button.
The application is still working, and you can restore it.
The window goes full screen when you click the "Maximize" button.
The window does this when you click on the title bar and drag to the side.

question.prompt: In Windows 10, which menu of the Settings app manages the accessibility settings?
question.feedback: This menu deals with Bluetooth and other devices.
This menu manages network settings.
This menu contains many accessibility features.
This menu controls privacy settings.

question.prompt: Which one is an operating system?
question.feedback: Notepad is an application.
Microsoft Word is an application.
Microsoft Windows is the most popular operating system.
Paint is an application.

question.prompt: Which one is a function of an application?
question.choice: Allowing human control of the computer
question.feedback: Managing computer hardware is a function of an operating system.
Managing computer software is a function of an operating system.
Allowing human control of the computer is a function of an operating system.
A calculator is an application for doing calculations.

question.prompt: You can use the portable storage devices to:
question.choice: Improve storage abilities of your computer.
Transfer files from computer to another computer.
Save a copy in a safe location.
question.feedback: This response is not the only true statement.
This response is not the only true statement.
This response is not the only true statement.
Portable storage devices make storing and dealing with files easier.

question.prompt: These devices can be connected to a computer through Bluetooth technology except:
question.feedback: Wireless speakers can be connected to a computer through Bluetooth technology.
A wireless mouse can be connected to a computer through Bluetooth technology.
A hard drive needs to be connected directly to a computer. This affects the speed of accessing stored files.
Wireless headphones can be connected to a computer through Bluetooth technology.
